statements: SELECT * FROM raw_materials
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM raw_materials WHERE supplier_id = 1
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM raw_materials WHERE quantity > 100
SELECT * FROM raw_materials WHERE material_id = 3
SELECT material_name, supplier_id FROM raw_materials ORDER BY supplier_id DESC
SELECT * FROM raw_materials WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY material_name DESC
SELECT material_name, quantity, supplier_id FROM raw_materials WHERE supplier_id = 1 ORDER BY quantity ASC
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM raw_materials WHERE material_name LIKE '%steel%' AND quantity < 50
SELECT * FROM raw_materials WHERE supplier_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY supplier_id, material_name
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM raw_materials WHERE quantity >= 50 AND (material_name = 'plastic' OR material_name = 'steel')
SELECT * FROM RawMaterialsInventory
SELECT material_name, quantity_in_stock FROM RawMaterialsInventory WHERE quantity_in_stock > 100
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, phone_number FROM Suppliers
SELECT material_name, supplier_id, quantity_in_stock FROM RawMaterialsInventory JOIN Suppliers ON RawMaterialsInventory.supplier_id = Suppliers.supplier_id
SELECT * FROM RawMaterialsInventory ORDER BY last_inventory_update DESC
SELECT * FROM RawMaterialsInventory WHERE quantity_in_stock > 100 ORDER BY material_name ASC
SELECT material_id, material_name, quantity_in_stock FROM RawMaterialsInventory WHERE supplier_id = 1 ORDER BY quantity_in_stock DESC

SELECT material_name, quantity_in_stock, supplier_name FROM RawMaterialsInventory INNER JOIN Suppliers ON RawMaterialsInventory.supplier_id = Suppliers.supplier_id ORDER BY supplier_name, quantity_in_stock ASC

SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(material_id) AS total_materials FROM RawMaterialsInventory INNER JOIN Suppliers ON RawMaterialsInventory.supplier_id = Suppliers.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING total_materials > 5
SELECT * FROM RawMaterialsInventory WHERE last_inventory_update BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking
SELECT material_id, quantity_used FROM inventory_tracking WHERE production_order_id = 123
SELECT material_id, SUM(quantity_used) AS total_used FROM inventory_tracking GROUP BY material_id
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM raw_materials ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM production_orders WHERE order_quantity > 100
SELECT * FROM raw_materials ORDER BY material_name DESC
SELECT material_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM raw_materials GROUP BY material_name HAVING total_quantity > 100
SELECT * FROM production_orders WHERE order_quantity BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT raw_materials.material_name, inventory_tracking.quantity_used FROM raw_materials JOIN inventory_tracking ON raw_materials.id = inventory_tracking.material_id
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM production_orders
SELECT * FROM RawMaterials;
SELECT material_id, material_name, unit_price FROM RawMaterials ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT line_name, supervisor_id, location FROM ProductionLines WHERE supervisor_id = 101;
SELECT material_name, quantity_in_stock FROM RawMaterials WHERE quantity_in_stock < 50;
SELECT material_id, SUM(quantity_used) AS total_usage FROM UsageLogs GROUP BY material_id;
SELECT * FROM RawMaterials WHERE quantity_in_stock > 100 ORDER BY material_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT material_name, unit_price FROM RawMaterials WHERE unit_price < 50 ORDER BY unit_price ASC
SELECT material_name, quantity_in_stock FROM RawMaterials WHERE quantity_in_stock < 50 ORDER BY material_id

SELECT * FROM ProductionOrders JOIN RawMaterials ON ProductionOrders.material_id = RawMaterials.material_id WHERE ProductionOrders.quantity_required > 100 ORDER BY ProductionOrders.deadline DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT ProductionOrders.order_id, ProductionOrders.quantity_required, ProductionOrders.deadline, RawMaterials.material_name FROM ProductionOrders JOIN RawMaterials ON ProductionOrders.material_id = RawMaterials.material_id WHERE ProductionOrders.deadline > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY ProductionOrders.quantity_required DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM raw_materials;
SELECT name, quantity FROM raw_materials WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM production_orders ORDER BY deadline ASC;
SELECT supplier, quantity_change FROM inventory_logs WHERE quantity_change < 0;
SELECT supplier_id, name, contact_info FROM suppliers;
SELECT * FROM raw_materials WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT name, quantity FROM raw_materials WHERE supplier = 'Supplier A';
SELECT * FROM production_orders WHERE deadline > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT p.line_name, p.production_capacity, i.timestamp FROM production_lines p JOIN inventory_logs i ON p.line_id = i.raw_material_id;
SELECT s.name AS supplier_name, r.name AS raw_material_name FROM suppliers s JOIN raw_materials r ON s.supplier_id = r.id;
